channel.title: sTiLl No One Has Helped Me!
channel.description:
welp im using rune warfare base and i added jungle spiders. and in npchandler.java i added this.
[code=java]if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 61) { // jungle spiders rand_npc = misc.random(20);[/code]
save and compiled with no errors. but they can only do 2 damage. if any1 can help id apreciate it.

@bobbykinney000 wrote:

i dont want your opinions on whats a good source or not, I just want help on my problem im currently facing if you cant help me then leave my topic.

his “combat level” doesn’t changes than, only his hit.[/quote] that depends on which [size=30pt]SOURCE[/size] that he is using it varies from server to server.
try both ideas

item.title: sTiLl No One Has Helped Me!
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“bobbykinney000, post:1, topic:305520”]welp im using rune warfare base and i added jungle spiders. and in npchandler.java i added this.

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 61) { // jungle spiders rand_npc = misc.random(20);

save and compiled with no errors. but they can only do 2 damage. if any1 can help id apreciate it.[/quote]

try this:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 61) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2851; //jungle spider attack
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20);

That should make it so it hits a minimum of 0 and a max of 20.
any more problems don’t be shy

Read full topic
